item.description:
Hello Everyone! It has been a while since we have gotten together. Here is what Vanessa one of our members suggested. Deraldo will be playing at the Milky Way Lounge in JP. Come for either the music, some samba dancing or just too meet some new people.

Thanks Vanessa for the suggestion and again this group is for any one so if there is a paticular activity that you would like for us to post feel free to send us your suggestions.

Tchau!

Directions:http://milkywayjp.com...


Large version of the flyer here: http://photos2.meetup...

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Samba Tremeterra in Jamaica Plain
